attributes.comment:
I have been reading that you are going to increase the fees for adoption process. I
am posting this here to state that I strongly disagree with this increase. The
process of adoption, and government fees, have doubled since our last adoption
in '98. It is almost impossible to afford the process at all as it is, now it will be
even less so with a 66 percent increase from you. We started our second
adoption process in fall '05 and will not finish until this summer. We planned out
every penny to the dime, as we had to borrow the money( almost everyone has to)
and now you are going to ask us to come up with more money than we planned.
This increase is HUGE!!! Maybe a small one would be understandable, but not
this. There are so many government programs that are out of hand, esp. welfare.
We are good tax paying citizens that actually work for a living, and we end up
paying for those who do not want to work! ( I know there are a few that actually
need this service, that is okay, but most do NOT) All I am saying is do not stick a
good program like adoption with more fees, try something else, PLEASE!
Thank you for letting us voice our opinion, I hope you will listen.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
